alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 12:06AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, south central Craven, central Onslow and southwestern Carteret Counties through 1230 AM EST... At 1206 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Piney Green, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Havelock, Morehead City, New River Station, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Camp Lejeune Center, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, Cape Carteret, Silverdale, Kellum, Midway Park, Verona, Broad Creek, Kuhns, Peletier, Bogue and Hammocks Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
